verse: As governor, I signed the agreement together with Zedekiah and the following priests:
Seraiah, Azariah, Jeremiah, Pashhur, Amariah, Malchijah, Hattush, Shebaniah, Malluch, Harim, Meremoth, Obadiah, Daniel, Ginnethon, Baruch, Meshullam, Abijah, Mijamin, Maaziah, Bilgai, and Shemaiah.
The Levites who signed were: Jeshua son of Azaniah, Binnui from the clan of Henadad, Kadmiel,
The leaders who signed were: Parosh, Pahath Moab, Elam, Zattu, Bani,
